sentence.Network_en: Australian plant of genus Pipturus whose fiber is used in making cloth.
sentence.Network_cn: 澳大利亚的一种落尾木属植物,其纤维可供纺织用.

sentence.Network_en: Hawaiian tree of genus Pipturus having a bark ( tapa ) from which tapa cloth is made.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏威夷落尾麻属树种,树皮可制成塔帕纤维布.

PerfectNetExp.abs: piptocephalidaceae 头珠霉科, pipturus 落尾木属, piptoporus 滴孔菌属

means.word_mean: 1. an Australian genus of woody plants of the family Urticaceae
